event: Represented Delhi in a district-level cricket tournament, showcasing teamwork and sportsmanship.
Won 2nd place in the NSO Science Olympiad and served as Sports Captain, leading teams in inter-school tournaments.
Completed my 12th grade from Venkateshwar International School, New Delhi, with 81% in Science stream.
Began B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering at Graphic Era University, Dehradun, laying the foundation for my technical journey.
Successfully completed major academic projects, including a Vegetable Selling Website and a Data Aggregation solution for Wireless Sensor Networks.
Actively participated in inter-college cricket and table tennis tournaments, further developing leadership and competitive skills.
Published research paper on Privacy Preserving Data Aggregation Techniques in IJCRT, demonstrating a commitment to advancing technology and security.
Interned at GlobalLogic as an Associate Analyst, focusing on machine learning, optimization, and real-world data analysis.
Graduated with a B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering, achieving strong academic results and project experience.
Joined LTIMindtree as a Software Engineer, contributing to enterprise web applications in the banking domain and collaborating with cross-functional teams.
Achieved Oracle Certified Java SE 11 Professional certification, validating advanced Java programming expertise.
